page.title: 18EDALE CHURCH CENTENARY.
page.content:
The village of Edale celebrated the 1st centenary of the Parish Church in June 1985.{Events.}A village "Fun Day" _ sports competitions between the 5 booths.A group photograph of most of the residents.A Victorian cricket match between farmers and artistes.An exhibition of photograph documents and artifacts called "100 years of Edale life"was held in the church.The church was open for 3 days and visited by 1,0 00 people.A recitation "Rhyme or Reason" at the Village Hall by Miss Rowan Mc Culloch.A concert given by the school children at the Village Hall,called "A Celebration of Centenaries" consisting of music,drama and poetry.A Centenary Evensong Service on Sunday 2nd June conducted by Rev.A.Murray-Leslie and Rev.R.Giles
{ }
